old.org.bouncycastle.cert.jcajce

Class JcaX509CertificateHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • old.org.bouncycastle.cert.X509CertificateHolder
      • old.org.bouncycastle.cert.jcajce.JcaX509CertificateHolder

  • public class JcaX509CertificateHolder
extends X509CertificateHolder
    JCA helper class for converting an X509Certificate into a X509CertificateHolder object.
